definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
period of low water level (winter in north China)

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section daring the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: The Yellow River becomes a continental river in low-water seasons.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期，黃河也成了“內陸河”了。

sentences.english: It has descended obviously since the construction of Gezhouba.
sentences.chinese: 自葛洲壩修建以來，宜昌斷面枯水位明顯下降。

sentences.english: The total bacteria numbers and population of each section during the flood period are greater than in dry season.
sentences.chinese: 各斷面的細菌總數和種屬數，都是豐水期大於枯水期。

sentences.english: The status of organic pollution of six river segments was investigated during dry season.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期調查了G市六個河流斷面的有機污染狀況。

sentences.english: From the west bank one can walk to the Orange Islet during the winter dry season.
sentences.chinese: 冬天枯水季節可以從河西走到橘子洲頭。

sentences.english: The paper analyzes ground survey of flood and low water in hydrological survey station.
sentences.chinese: 對水文測站的洪水與枯水巡視進行了可行性分析。

sentences.english: The system persistence time of total Hg was the longest at the period of low water and the shortest in flush time.
sentences.chinese: 總汞的在體系中滯留的時間枯水期最長，豐水期最短。

sentences.english: Granulation and decay is the key problem of citrus fruits storage.
sentences.chinese: 枯水浮皮與腐爛是柑桔果實貯藏中的主要問題。

sentences.english: Poyang Lake has entered dry season 40 days earlier than normal.
sentences.chinese: 鄱陽湖比正常年份提前40天進入枯水期。

sentences.english: As a result, it will discharge at "low water" continuously.
sentences.chinese: 因此，將長期下泄“枯水”流量。

sentences.english: Doulizi beach is the dry rapids in Chuanjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 川江斗笠子灘爲枯水急流灘險。

definition: period of low water level (winter in north China)
Three Gorges Reservoir on the Changjiang or Yangtze
ice-jam flood (arising when river downstream freezes more than upstream)
